quizDescription: Test your sense of humor with these pun-tastic animal-themed questions!

questions.question: What do you call a bear with no teeth?
questions.explanation: A bear with no teeth is 'Gummy Bear.' It can't chew much!

questions.question: Why don't seagulls fly over the bay?
options: Because then they'd be called bagels
questions.answer: Because then they'd be called bagels
questions.explanation: Seagulls don't fly over the bay because 'then they'd be called bagels' instead of seagulls!

questions.question: What do you get when you cross a snowman and a vampire?
questions.explanation: When you cross a snowman and a vampire, you get 'Frostbite'!

questions.question: Why did the chicken join a band?
options: Because it wanted to lay down some beats
Because it had a great cluck-tion of songs
Because it lost its job as a fry cook
questions.answer: Because it wanted to lay down some beats
questions.explanation: The chicken joined a band 'because it wanted to lay down some beats' and become a 'rockin' rooster'!

questions.question: Why don't oysters donate to charity?
questions.explanation: Oysters don't donate to charity because they're 'shellfish' and keep their pearls to themselves!
